casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Wayne STANLEY 376P02-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 17, 2016 Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of NC. Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Stanley, Robert Wayne.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of November 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of November 2016." Ervin, J. recused
